title: ip boost are broken
body:
Dear Riot....

What is wrong with your store? I was looking at the boosts section just out of curiosity and to my surprise I saw this.
1 IP Wins Boost cost 2560rp.
2 IP Wins Boost cost 160rp.
The rest are just as obscure but I can't be bothered typing them all in. You can not bye them so I would take it that you know.
But Riot please I cry like every time{{item:3070}} ......Not literally.

Edit.
Thank you riot it's fix!

replies.body:
Hey there,

I've forwarded this issue onto the correct people and they are investigating now.

Thanks for the report!
